BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
 
 Streamlit's version of Plotly is apparently not the latest, resulting in some rendering issues.
 See: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/plotly/plotly.py/issues/2141#issuecomment-728201906>this plotly issue comment</denchmark-link>
 
 For the original comment this was in response to, see: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/plotly/plotly.py/issues/2141#issuecomment-726247537>this issue comment</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
 
 
 Streamlit version: 0.71.0 (via pip)
 Plotly version: 4.12.0 (via conda-forge)
 Python version: 3.6.11
 Using Conda

comments_0.comment_text: Hi Jenna, thanks for flagging this. We'll take a look at getting Plotly updated!
